Create.description: Button used for creating/adding new object or data.

Add.description: Button used for creating/adding new object or data.

Add new.description: Button used for creating/adding new object or data.

Update.description: Button used for updating an object, data, app, etc.

Edit.description: Button used for editing or modifying an object or data.

Change.description: Label for buttons used for changing/modifying some data.

Modify.description: Button for modifying/changing an object or data.

Yes, I'm sure.description: Button for confirming a possibly destructive or serious action.

Yes, delete.description: Button for confirming a deleting action.

Yes, remove.description: Button for confirming a removing action.

Cancel.description: Button used for cancelling or discarding an action.

Clear.description: Button used for clearing or erasing some data such as an input value.

Discard.description: Button used for discarding or cancelling an action.

Close.description: Button used for closing a window, program, menu, popup or a modal.

Exit.description: Button exiting from a window or an application.

Quit.description: Button for quitting/closing an application or a window.

Install.description: Button or label for installing software, app, etc.

Upgrade.description: Button or label for upgrading software, app, etc.

Accept.description: Button or Label used for asking user to accept something, such as terms and conditions.

I accept.description: Button or Label used for asking user to accept something, such as terms and conditions.

Getting started.description: Button or Link used for taking user to a "Getting started" page.

Learn more.description: Button or Link used for taking user to a "Learn more" page or showing them more information about something.

Pricing.description: Button or Link for plans and pricing.

Plans.description: Button or Link for plans and pricing.

About.description: Button or Label for "About" page or information.

About us.description: Button or Label for "About us" page or information.

Contact.description: Button or Label for "Contact" page of information.

Contact us.description: Button or Label for "Contact us" page or information.

Get the app.description: Label for asking user to download an app.

Login.description: Button for submitting login form, or label for link to login page.

Sign in.description: Button for submitting sign in form, or label for link to sign in page.

Sign up.description: Button for submitting sign up form, or label for link to sign up page.

Don't have an account? Sign up.description: Label for asking user to sign up.

Reset password.description: Label for "Reset password" link or text.

Email.description: Label for email address form field.

Full name.description: Label for full name form field.

First name.description: Label for first name form field.

Middle name.description: Label for middle name form field.

Last name.description: Label for last name form field.

Shipping address.description: Label for shipping address form field.

Billing address.description: Label for billing address form field.

Select your language.description: Label for asking user to select their preferred language.

Please select your language.description: Label for asking user to select their preferred language.

Error.description: The word "error" to notify user about an error or a failed action.

Sorry.description: The word "sorry" in case of an error, or unsuccessful action or event.

Something went wrong.description: Error message when something goes wrong.

Please check your internet connection an.description: Error message for bad internet connection.
Please check your internet connection an.value: अपने इंटरनेट कनेक्शन की जाँच करें और दुबारा प्रयास करें

The page you're looking for doesn't exis.value: जिस पेज को  आप खोज रहे हैं वह मौजूद नहीं है

Retry.description: Button for retrying a failed action.

Try again.description: Button or message for asking user to try again a failed action.

Please try again.description: Message for asking user to try again a failed action.

Invalid username or password.description: Error message for failed login attempt due to wrong username or password.

Wrong username or password.description: Error message for failed login attempt due to wrong username or password.

This username is already taken.description: Error message for already taken username.

Success.description: The word "success" to tell user of a successful event or action.

Changes saved successfully.description: Success message after a successful form save.

Password changed successfully.description: Success message after a user changes password.

Are you sure you want to permanently del.description: Warning message before user tries to permanently delete a file.
Warning message before user tries to permanently delete an object, data, etc.

Are you sure you want to delete this?.description: Warning message before user tries to delete an object, data, etc.
